replies.bodyText: So I believe that we should throw IllegalStateException from io.quarkus.quartz.runtime.QuartzScheduler.produceQuartzScheduler() if QuartzScheduler.scheduler is null. However, in this case we inject io.quarkus.quartz.runtime.QuartzScheduler which is OK. @adrianfiedler you should rather inject io.quarkus.scheduler.Scheduler which is part of the API (and is implemented by QuartzScheduler).
